items.title: Rain returns to the Anila watershed
items.summary: Local crews built living check-dams and planted riparian corridors, reviving perennial springs for 1,200 families.

items.title: Farmers double yields with regenerative grains
items.summary: Women-led cooperatives piloted drought-ready grains, cutting input costs and restoring topsoil.

items.title: Research plots unlock community-led data
items.summary: Citizen scientists monitored soil moisture and carbon, informing adaptive planting calendars across three regions.
